name: sprint_lock
title: SPRINT LOCK
desc: Set the Sprint input mode.
<font=text_4m>Toggle:</> Press the Sprint button to toggle between running and walking.
<font=text_4m>Hold:</> Keep the Sprint button pressed to run.
<font=text_4m>Lock:</> Always Sprint until movement is interrupted or stopped.

name: equip_lock
title: EQUIP LOCK
desc: Toggle the equip lock off or on.
<font=text_4m>ON:</> Holster the equipped weapon by pressing the dedicated holstering input.
<font=text_4m>OFF:</> Holster the equipped weapon by pressing the same shortcut and/or radial.

name: suspensor_lock
title: SUSPENSOR LOCK
desc: Toggle the suspensor lock off or on.
<font=text_4m>ON:</> Press and press again to use the suspensors, without input hold.
<font=text_4m>OFF:</> Press and hold to use the suspensors.

name: invert_mouse_y_axis
title: INVERT MOUSE Y-AXIS
desc: Invert the camera controls along the vertical axis.

name: mouse_camera_sensitivity
title: MOUSE CAMERA SENSITIVITY
desc: Adjust the sensitivity of how quickly the Character Camera moves.

name: mouse_aiming_sensitivity
title: MOUSE AIMING SENSITIVITY
desc: Adjust the sensitivity of how quickly the Character Camera moves while aiming down sight.

name: show_helmet
title: SHOW HELMET
desc: Display the equipped helmet on your character.

name: placeable_rotation_building_mode
title: PLACEABLE ROTATION BUILDING MODE
desc: Set the placeable rotation method when using building mode.

name: disable_camera_auto_center
title: DISABLE CAMERA AUTO-CENTER
desc: Enable or disable the camera centering automatically after moving with vehicles.

name: invert_mouse_y_axis
title: INVERT MOUSE Y-AXIS
desc: Invert the air vehicle controls along the vertical axis.

name: planar_lock
title: PLANAR LOCK
desc: Set the planar lock on or off.
<font=text_4m>ON:</> The ornithopter will change altitude only with the ascend and descend inputs.
<font=text_4m>OFF:</> The ornithopter will change altitude also based on the direction faced when pitching.

name: input_lock_mode_mouse
title: INPUT LOCK MODE MOUSE
desc: Controls the behaviour of the radial wheel slot highlighting based on the mouse cursor position.
<font=text_4m>Flick & Remember:</>
No slot is highlighted by default. Moving the mouse cursor to the centre of the wheel will not unhighlight the currently highlighted slot.
<font=text_4m>Flick & Forget:</>
No slot is highlighted by default. Moving the mouse cursor to the centre of the wheel will unhighlight the currently highlighted slot.

name: close_behaviour
title: CLOSE BEHAVIOUR
desc: Controls the behaviour of the controller left thumbstick input to the character movement after the radial wheel has been closed.
<font=text_4m>Require Axis Input Reset:</>

The character will not move in the direction of the left thumbstick until either it has been returned to the centre or the delay time has been reached after closing the radial wheel. Affected by the controller axis reset deadzone and controller axis reset delay (s) settings.
<font=text_4m>Maintain Axis Input:</>
The character will move in the direction of the left thumbstick after closing the radial wheel.

name: gamma
title: GAMMA
desc: Set the game screen's lightning and gamma based on your preferences.

name: field_of_view
title: FIELD OF VIEW
desc: Set the game's Field of View camera size. Higher settings will have a minor impact on the CPU and GPU.

name: motion_blur
title: MOTION BLUR
desc: Turn the Motion Blur on or off.
Minor Impact on the performance of the game.

name: vsync
title: VSYNC
desc: Vertical Synchronization will align the game's frame rate to your monitor's refresh rate to negate screen tearing, at the cost of a minor impact on the input response time

name: language
title: LANGUAGE
desc: Set the game's user interface text language.

name: frame_rate_cap
title: FRAME RATE CAP
desc: Set a frame rate cap for the game during gameplay.
Higher frame rates will have a major impact on the CPU and GPU.

name: dynamic_hud
title: DYNAMIC HUD
desc: Enable or disable the fade out of inactive HUD elements.

name: ultrawide_support
title: ULTRAWIDE SUPPORT
desc: Extend the HUD to support Ultra-Wide Monitors.

name: use_hardware_cursor
title: USE HARDWARE CURSOR
desc: Enable or disable hardware input for the cursor. Can improve mouse cursor response and smoothness during lag.

name: show_hotbar
title: SHOW HOTBAR
desc: Enable or disable the item hotbar. This automatically disables the mini radial wheel.

name: hide_mini_radial_wheel
title: HIDE MINI RADIAL WHEEL
desc: Enable or disable the Mini Radial Wheel. This is automatically disabled when the item hotbar is enabled.

name: invert_mouse_wheel
title: INVERT MOUSE WHEEL
desc: Inverts the direction of the mouse wheel input.

name: show_chat_bubbles
title: SHOW CHAT BUBBLES
desc: Enable or disable chat bubbles over other player's characters when close enough to them and they send proximity message.

name: show_voice_chat_indicator
title: SHOW VOICE CHAT INDICATOR
desc: Enable or disable voice chat indicator over other player's characters. This will be shown if the players are close enough to each other and voice chat is used.

name: quality_presets
title: QUALITY PRESETS
desc: Change the overall graphics quality preset of the game.
<font=text_4m>Auto</> will detect optimal settings based on a quick benchmark of the hardware.
Higher settings will have a major impact on performance.

name: window_mode
title: WINDOW MODE
desc: Set the Window Mode for the game.
<font=text_4m>Windowed:</>
The game will be rendered in a window with borders.
<font=text_4m>Windowed Fullscreen:</>
Windowed but locked to the monitor's resolution.
<font=text_4m>Fullscreen:</>
The game will be rendered in the full size of the monitor currently used for the game.

name: resolution
title: RESOLUTION
desc: Set the Resolution size of the game.
Higher settings will have a major impact on the CPU and GPU performance.

name: upscaling_quality
title: UPSCALING QUALITY
desc: Set the Upscaling quality for the game.

Upscaling is used to achieve detailed images using fewer pixels to maximise performance. This setting influences upscaling parameters and resolution scale based on target quality and current resolution.
High impact on GPU performance.

name: upscaling_method
title: UPSCALING METHOD
desc: Set the Upscaling quality for the game.
Upscaling is used to achieve detailed images using fewer pixels to maximise performance.
This setting influences upscaling parameters and resolution scale based on target quality and current resolution.
High impact on GPU performance.

name: frame_generation_method
title: FRAME GENERATION METHOD
desc: Set the Frame Generation method. Generates additional frames to increase framerate.
Frame Generation is supported only by specific graphics cards. DLSSG can only be used with DLSS Upscaling method.
High impact on global framerate.

name: shadows
title: SHADOWS
desc: Set the shadow quality for the game. This includes shadow distance and resolution of dynamic shadows.
High impact on GPU performance.

name: virtual_shadow_maps
title: VIRTUAL SHADOW MAPS (EXPERIMENTAL)
desc: Enhances shadow quality.
This feature is still in experimental phase, which could lead to stability and performance issues.
Recommended for GPUs with more than 10GB of VRAM for best results.
High impact on VRAM and GPU performance.

name: gi_quality
title: GI QUALITY
desc: Set the Global Illumination quality of the ambient lighting.
This determines the resolution and accuracy of the ambient lighting.
High impact on VRAM and GPU performance.

name: reflections_quality
title: REFLECTIONS QUALITY
desc: Set the reflections quality of the ambient lighting.
This determines the resolution and accuracy of reflections.
Moderate impact on GPU performance.

name: low_end_laptop_mode
title: LOW END LAPTOP MODE (EXPERIMENTAL)
desc: Experimental scalability mode intended for very low-end machines to achieve acceptable performance. Visual quality is drastically reduced.

name: limit_process_cpu_usage
title: LIMIT PROCESS CPU USAGE (EXPERIMENTAL)
desc: Reserves 1 CPU core for background tasks (process affinity). Will reduce game performance.

name: view_distance
title: VIEW DISTANCE
desc: Changes the maximum distance that objects are rendered. This includes foliage and scattered objects.
Low impact on CPU and GPU performance.

name: post_processing
title: POST PROCESSING
desc: Set the screen-based effects quality for the game. This includes motion blur and bloom.
Low impact on GPU performance.

name: effects_quality
title: EFFECTS QUALITY
desc: Set the visual effects quality for the game. This includes particle effects and shader quality.
Low impact on GPU performance.

name: texture_quality
title: TEXTURE QUALITY
desc: Set the texture resolution quality for the game. This includes all in-game textures and can increase texture detail.
High impact on VRAM.

name: foliage_quality
title: FOLIAGE QUALITY
desc: Set the foliage quality for the game. This includes density of foliage such as grass.
Moderate impact on GPU performance.

name: mastering_mode
title: MASTERING MODE
desc: Select Mastering Mode to optimize the game's Audio output.

name: master_volume
title: MASTER VOLUME
desc: Set the maximum volume of the game's audio.
This setting determines the maximum volume of all other audio volume settings.

name: music_volume_in_game
title: MUSIC VOLUME IN GAME
desc: Set the maximum volume of the game's soundtrack.

name: sound_effects_volume
title: SOUND EFFECTS VOLUME
desc: Set the maximum volume of the game's sound effects.

name: cutscenes_volume
title: CUTSCENES VOLUME
desc: Set the maximum volume of the game's cutscenes.

name: dialog_volume
title: DIALOG VOLUME
desc: Set the maximum volume of the NPC dialogues.

name: radio_volume
title: RADIO VOLUME
desc: Set the volume for the Radio.

name: enable_voice_chat
title: ENABLE VOICE CHAT
desc: Enable or disable the incoming voice chat.

name: voice_activation_mode
title: VOICE ACTIVATION MODE
desc: Set the how to activate outgoing Voice Chat:
<font=text_4m>Push-To-Talk:</> Keep the key pressed to talk.
<font=text_4m>Toggle:</> Press the key once to turn voice chat on or off.

name: audio_output_device
title: AUDIO OUTPUT DEVICE
desc: Select the target output audio device.

titles: DELL S2216H (AMD High Definition Audio Device)

name: audio_input_device
title: AUDIO INPUT DEVICE
desc: Select the target input audio device.

name: camera_shakes
title: CAMERA SHAKES
desc: Turns the brief camera movements on or off in fights, when receiving fall damage, and other impactful effects.

name: subtitles
title: SUBTITLES
desc: Turn subtitles on or off.

name: show_prev_subtitle
title: SHOW PREVIOUS SUBTITLE
desc: Set if the previous subtitle line should be displayed to allow for reading of longer sentences for slower readers.

name: font_size
title: FONT SIZE
desc: Set the font size of the Subtitles.

name: data_collection
title: DATA COLLECTION
desc: I agree to share with Funcom select information about my device. This information is only used for determining effectiveness of advertising campaigns, that will in turn help us bring more players to Dune: Awakening and create a thriving community.
For more information about how this data is processed, please see the Dune: Awakening privacy policy.

name: streamer_mode
title: STREAMER MODE
desc: Streamer friendly mode mutes licensed audio, disables invite notifications, hides your character and current server names.
